support.name: Unstable Treasure Chest
support.desc:
When the holder dies, the 4 highest percent health allies gain a temporary completed item.

​​[Support item]

support.name: The Eternal Flame
support.desc:
While the holder is alive, all enemies are 33% Wounded and all allies gain 8.0% Damage Amp. This effect refreshes every 5 seconds.

​​[Support item]
Wound: Reduces healing received

support.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
support.desc:
Combat start: The holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a 250 Shield, 20 Armor, and 20 Magic Resist for 20 seconds.

​​[Support item]

support.name: Randuin's Omen
support.desc:
Combat start: Grant %i:scaleArmor% 30 Armor and %i:scaleMR% 30 Magic Resistance to the holder and adjacent allies.

​​[Support item]

support.name: Moonstone Renewer
support.desc:
Every 4 seconds, grant a 55-325 Shield (based on Stage) to the 2 lowest percent health allies for 4 seconds.

​​[Support item]

support.name: Aegis of the Legion
support.desc:
Combat start: Grant 25% Attack Speed and 15 Armor and Magic Resist to the holder, adjacent allies in the same row, and all allies behind them for 12 seconds.

​​[Support item]

support.name: Chalice of Power
support.desc:
Combat start: Grant 25 Ability Power and 10 Mana to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

​​[Support item]

special.name: Anima's Embrace
special.desc: Regenerate <TFTRadiantItemBonus>5.0%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> of missing Health each second.

special.name: Critical Hit!
special.desc: Grants the champion 100% critical strike chance, and their spell can critically strike.

special.name: Shadow Mic
special.desc:
Place on Kayn to unlock his Shadow vocal power, permanently improving his Reaping Slash spell to deal bonus damage at the start of combat.

[KAYN CONSUMABLE - This item disappears when used and DESTROYS the Fury Guitar]

[Can only be used during the Planning Phase]

special.name: Ace
special.desc: Cause this unit to deal @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT_UnitProperty_Debug@% damage on their next attack.
<tftrules> This transforms into a random item at the start of combat!</tftrules>

special.name: Sentinel Swarm
special.desc: Every 3 seconds, summon a powerful Sentinel equipped with Completed, Artifact, and Radiant items.

special.name: Fury Guitar
special.desc:
Place on Kayn to unleash his Fury Rapper energy, permanently improving his Reaping Slash Ability to heal him.

[KAYN CONSUMABLE - This item disappears when used and DESTROYS the Shadow Mic]

[Can only be used during the Planning Phase]

special.name: Damage Amp
special.desc: Cause this unit to deal  @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT_UnitProperty_Debug@% increased damage. Does not stack. Lasts until the unit is deconstructed.

special.name: Golden Item Remover
special.desc: Use on a champion to unequip all items as many times as you want. Converts all future Magnetic Removers to Reforgers.

special.name: Taunt
special.desc: Taunt all enemies who are in range to attack the target.

special.name: EDM Selector
special.desc:
Use this on an EDM champion to select them. The selected champion determines the frequency of EDM casts.

Jax: Every @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT10_Trait_EDM_JaxFrequency@ seconds.
Lux: Every @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT10_Trait_EDM_LuxFrequency@ seconds.
Zac: Every @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT10_Trait_EDM_ZacFrequency@ seconds.
Zed: Every @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT10_Trait_EDM_ZedFrequency@ seconds.

special.name: Zz'Rot Portal
special.desc:
Combat start: Taunt.
On death, a Voidspawn arises, Taunting nearby enemies. The Voidspawn has massively reduced effectiveness when created by a summoned unit.

Taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter

special.name: Do You Know Who I Am?
Accomplice's Gloves
special.desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random Support items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]
@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT_BindOnEquipTRA@

special.name: Unusable Slot
special.desc: This slot can't hold an item.
